attributes.action: Give Diabetics the same rights and entitlements to Insurances, Life Insurances and Critical Care Insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My husband has recently been told that he cannot be insured for critical illness on our new life insurance. His policy for just basic life cover is almost double the cost of my policy, which does cover me for critical illness! This does not seem fair and we urge people to sign this petition. Thank you.
